item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 12, 2025 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Happy 20th Birthday, Y Combinator (869 points | 172 comments)
2. Sorting Algorithm with CUDA (20 points | 8 comments)
3. Fastplotlib: GPU-accelerated, fast, and interactive plotting library (323 points | 124 comments)
4. New tools for building agents (253 points | 92 comments)
5. Show HN: Factorio Learning Environment – Agents Build Factories (599 points | 179 comments)
6. NASA to launch space observatory that will map 450M galaxies (158 points | 67 comments)
7. In contrast to Earth, Mars's middle atmosphere appears driven by gravity waves (45 points | 12 comments)
8. Launch HN: Sift Dev (YC W25) – AI-Powered Datadog Alternative (51 points | 35 comments)
9. The US island that speaks Elizabethan English (192 points | 106 comments)
10. Show HN: We built a Plug-in Home Battery for the 99.7% of us without Powerwalls (160 points | 226 comments)
11. A 10x Faster TypeScript (1367 points | 627 comments)
12. India's Battle to Control the Democracy Narrative (58 points | 38 comments)
13. What Is It Like to Be a Bass? Fish-Eye View Photography (1919–22) (5 points | discuss)
14. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
15. Show HN: Krep a High-Performance String Search Utility Written in C (122 points | 46 comments)

17. Ask HN: How do you handle VAT / Sales Tax accounting as B2C SaaS? (34 points | 25 comments)
18. Backyard Cyanide (102 points | 41 comments)
19. Mapping the University of Chicago's 135-year expansion into Hyde Park and beyond (188 points | 61 comments)
20. NIST selects HQC as fifth algorithm for post-quantum encryption (128 points | 86 comments)
21. Smart researchers pioneer nanosensor for real-time iron detection in plants (20 points | 2 comments)
22. What makes code hard to read: Visual patterns of complexity (2023) (274 points | 278 comments)
23. Microsoft Windows 1.0 with Steve Ballmer (1986) (38 points | 21 comments)
24. The Startup CTO's Handbook (46 points | 6 comments)
25. How do we tell truths that might hurt? (1975) (34 points | 32 comments)
26. America Is Missing The New Labor Economy – Robotics Part 1 (155 points | 224 comments)
27. Show HN: Program Explorer, a container playground (55 points | 8 comments)
28. Show HN: Seven39, a social media app that is only open for 3 hours every evening (674 points | 321 comments)
29. Unix Needs a True Integrated Environment: CASE Closed (1989) [pdf] (19 points | 7 comments)
30. Percolation Theory [pdf] (41 points | 9 comments)
